abstract: Japanese artist Tabaimo, whose third New York solo show danDAN is at James Cohan Gallery in Chelsea, creates animated videos that focus on anxieties bubbling beneath surface of everyday life in Japan.
snippet: Tabaimo, whose third New York solo show, “danDAN,” runs through Oct. 28 at James Cohan Gallery in Chelsea, seems unblemished by success.
lead_paragraph: Tabaimo, whose third New York solo show, “danDAN,” runs through Oct. 28 at James Cohan Gallery in Chelsea, seems unblemished by success.

headline.main: Cutting Through Cute to the Real Japan
headline.print_headline: Cutting Through Cute To the Real Japan
headline.seo: Tabaimo Video Show at James Cohan Gallery
